known_issues: Production deployment failed with a deployment error (Version 30 publish attempt)
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Increase contrast/clarity of the logo mark (platform-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png > platform-logo-high-contrast.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Update the top-left header logo in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` to be more visible across the entire app by (a) increasing its rendered size on mobile and desktop and (b) improving contrast against both light and dark backgrounds (e.g., adding a subtle background/badge, border/ring, and/or shadow around the logo image).

If needed to achieve higher contrast, create and use a higher-contrast variant of the existing generated logo asset referenced by the header (`/assets/generated/platform-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png`) and update the header to use the new asset path consistently.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the app header (top-left) logo more visible by increasing size and contrast across the entire app

projectName: Increase header logo visibility (larger + higher contrast) across the app
